Name: Idle Game x100
About the game: Idle Game x100 is a simple but addictive idle game with various mechanics. Use different generators to produce passive income. Use these money to buy various upgrades to generate even more profit! Your goal is to unlock and complete all hidden objectives. You need to use prestige system to achieve it. Reset all your progress and get permanent multiplier for one of your generators. Benefits: Simple but addictive idle gameplay Various generators with fair prices and income Prestige system with randomized upgrades Different stats to track your progress Game can be completed but it's when all the fun just begins Achievements and global ranking Nice visuals and graphics
